title: Evidence for quantum annealing with more than one hundred qubits
title_cn: 超过一百量子比特的量子退火证据
abstract: Quantum technology is maturing to the point where quantum devices, such as quantum communication systems, quantum random number generators and quantum simulators may be built with capabilities exceeding classical computers. A quantum annealer, in particular, solves optimization problems by evolving a known initial configuration at non-zero temperature towards the ground state of a Hamiltonian encoding a given problem. Here, we present results from tests on a 108 qubit D-Wave One device based on superconducting flux qubits. By studying correlations we find that the device performance is inconsistent with classical annealing or that it is governed by classical spin dynamics. In contrast, we find that the device correlates well with simulated quantum annealing. We find further evidence for quantum annealing in the form of small-gap avoided level crossings characterizing the hard problems. To assess the computational power of the device we compare it against optimized classical algorithms.
abstract_cn: 量子技术已经日趋成熟，例如量子通信系统，量子随机数发生器和量子仿真器之类的量子设备可能具有超越传统计算机的能力。尤其是，量子退火器通过将已知的初始配置在非零温度下朝着编码给定问题的哈密顿量的基态发展来解决优化问题。在这里，我们介绍了基于超导通量量子比特的108量子比特D-Wave One设备的测试结果。通过研究相关性，我们发现器件性能与经典退火不一致或受经典自旋动力学支配。相反，我们发现该器件与模拟量子退火具有良好的相关性。我们找到了以小间隙避免的能跨越水平的形式进行量子退火的进一步证据，这些跨越表征了难题。为了评估设备的计算能力，我们将其与优化的经典算法进行了比较。

title: Visualization of electron nematicity and unidirectional antiferroic fluctuations at high temperatures in NaFeAs
title_cn: NaFeAs中高温下电子向列性和单向反铁性波动的可视化
abstract: Superconductivity in the iron pnictides is often closely connected to a nematic state in which the tetragonal symmetry of the crystal is spontaneously broken. Determining the dominant interactions responsible for this symmetry breaking is essential to understanding the superconducting state. Here, we use atomic-resolution variable-temperature scanning tunnelling spectroscopy to probe the nanoscale electronic structure of the nematically ordered, parent pnictide NaFeAs and compare it with non-nematic LiFeAs. Local electronic nematicity is only manifest in NaFeAs and is found to persist to high temperatures in the nominally tetragonal phase of the crystal. The spatial distribution and energy dependence of the electronic anisotropy at high temperatures is explained by the persistence of large-amplitude, short-range, unidirectional, antiferroic fluctuations, indicating that strong density-wave fluctuations exist and couple to near-Fermi surface electrons even far from the structural and density-wave phase boundaries.
abstract_cn: 铁素化物中的超导性通常与向列状态紧密相连，在向列状态中晶体的四边形对称性自然破裂。确定造成这种对称破坏的主要相互作用对于理解超导状态至关重要。在这里，我们使用原子分辨率的变温扫描隧道光谱技术来探测向列有序的，亲本的肽NaFeAs的纳米级电子结构，并将其与非向列LiFeAs进行比较。局部电子向列性仅在NaFeAs中表现出来，并发现在名义上的晶体四方相中持续高温。大范围，短程，单向，反铁性波动的持续存在解释了高温下电子各向异性的空间分布和能量依赖性，表明存在强的密度波波动，甚至与近费米表面电子耦合。从结构和密度波的相位边界。

title: Observation of three-dimensional massless Kane fermions in a zinc-blende crystal
title_cn: 闪锌矿晶体中三维无质量凯恩费米子的观察
abstract: Solid-state physics and quantum electrodynamics, with its ultrarelativistic (massless) particles, meet in the electronic properties of one-dimensional carbon nanotubes, two-dimensional graphene or topological-insulator surfaces. However, clear experimental evidence for electronic states with a conical dispersion relation in all three dimensions, conceivable for certain bulk materials, is still missing. Here, we study a zinc-blende crystal, HgCdTe, at the point of the semiconductor-to-semimetal topological transition. For this compound, we observe three-dimensional massless electrons, as certified from the dynamical conductivity increasing linearly with the photon frequency, with a velocity of about 106 m s−1. Applying a magnetic field B results in a -dependence of dipole-active inter-Landau-level resonances and spin splitting of Landau levels also following a -dependence—well-established signatures of ultrarelativistic particles but until now not observed experimentally in any solid-state electronic system.
abstract_cn: 具有超相对论（无质量）粒子的固态物理学和量子电动力学满足一维碳纳米管，二维石墨烯或拓扑绝缘体表面的电子特性。但是，仍然缺少关于在三个维度上都具有圆锥形弥散关系的电子状态的明确实验证据，这对于某些散装材料是可以想象的。在这里，我们研究了半导体-半金属拓扑转变点上的闪锌矿晶体HgCdTe。对于该化合物，我们观察到三维无质量电子，这是由动态电导率随光子频率线性增加证明的，其速度约为10 6 ＆＃8201; m＆＃8201; s ＆＃8722; 1 。施加磁场B会导致偶极活动的兰道能级间共振-的依赖性，以及朗道能级的自旋分裂也遵循-相关性，这是公认的超相对论粒子的特征，但直到现在还没有在任何固体中通过实验观察到状态电子系统。
